snippet: A Denver church is suing a man whose demonstration included showing pictures of fetuses, which the church says were too graphic.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column on Supreme Court's hearing of Colorado case involving anti-abortion protester Kenneth T Scott; case raises difficult First Amendment question of whether laws protecting free speech in public places are to be applied in the same way in instances where that speech might disturb children.
lead_paragraph: A Denver church is suing a man whose demonstration included showing pictures of fetuses, which the church says were too graphic.

headline.print_headline: In Abortion Protests, Which to Protect, Children or Speech?
headline.seo: Church Suit Says Abortion Protest Upset Children
headline.main: In Abortion Protests, Which to Protect, Children or Speech?
